Cycle to work.label: Travel time to employment centre by bicycle
Cycle to work.subtitle: Average travel time in minutes to nearest employment centre with 500+ jobs available
Cycle to work.longDescription: This indicator shows the average travel time in minutes to nearest employment centre with 500 to 4,999 jobs available by cycle (official statistics in development), in England, for periods 2014-2019.

Drive to work.label: Travel time to employment centre by car
Drive to work.subtitle: Average travel time in minutes to nearest employment centre with 500+ jobs available
Drive to work.longDescription: This indicator shows the average travel time in minutes to nearest employment centre with 500 to 4,999 jobs available by car (official statistics in development), in England, for periods 2014-2019.

Public transport or walk to work.label: Travel time to employment centre by public transport and walking
Public transport or walk to work.subtitle: Average travel time in minutes to nearest employment centre with 500+ jobs available
Public transport or walk to work.longDescription: This indicator shows the average travel time in minutes to nearest employment centre with 500 to 4,999 jobs available by public transport or walking (official statistics in development), in England, for periods 2014-2019.
